bibl.title: Visitors to Elephantine: Who Were They?
Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond
bibl.author: MAEHLER, Herwig

bibl.note: Inscriptions and graffiti both in Greek and in Demotic tell us something about the visitors to the temple of Khn√ªm. From the Ptolemaic to the Roman period, there is an obvious difference in the social class of the temple's customers.
MAEHLER Herwig, Visitors to Elephantine: Who Were They?
Janet H. JOHNSON (Ed.), Life in a Multi-Cultural Society: Egypt from Cambyses to Constantine and Beyond = SAOC. 51 (Chicago, 1992) pp. 209-213 et 2 pll.
